title: NIck Fury - Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.
description:
This digital (not scanned) collection includes some of Jim Steranko's early work for Marvel.

He was one of the most contemporary artists of the time, bringing the ideas of 60s pop and psychedelia into his work... with a touch of a Mad Men influence in the comic book world.

Present is some of his Captain America and X-Men work (non - Steranko issues are included for the complete story). 

The highlight of this collection is, of course, all his work for Nick Fury - Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Again, a volume of pre - Steranko stories is included for the complete story.

Be on the lookout for the first 60s appearance of Jimmy Woo from Agents of Atlas.
